posts.title: Tulsa Maps
posts.author: Jasmine
posts.smallDesc: Web application to support local businesses in downtown Tulsa, Oklahoma. Implemented the web framework in Node.js and Heroku.
posts.blogText: Tulsa Maps is a web mapping platform featuring locally owned businesses in the Tulsa area. Created accessible, responsive, and functional user interfaces to allow visitors on any device to have the same user experience.
posts.blogText02: This application is provided by a search query that takes key words and finds related businesses through the NoSQL MongoDB database.
posts.blogText03: The places pulled from the database originally come from Google Places/Maps API. This project is still in development, and as of June 2021, the main focus has primarily been the downtown Tulsa area.

posts.title: Doc J's Heat and Air
posts.author: Jasmine
posts.smallDesc: Promotional website for small business clients. Created and oversave wireframe designs from client requests.
posts.blogText: Doc J's Heat and Air is a startup company whose co-owners have more than 30 years of experience in the industry. They needed help with branding and website design. By working for Websites4good,I delivered a new mobile-ready website design that reflects the experience and personality of Deborah and Julius by Wordpress

posts.title: Oklahoma Rare
posts.author: Jasmine
posts.smallDesc: Volunteer project to help people in the OK Rare community manage day-to-day tasks.
posts.blogText: Oklahoma Rare is a non-profit advocacy group started by two parents of children with rare diseases. The goal of the organization is to promote community within the rare community and their families.
posts.blogText02: In order to support OK Rare, this application is created by React and Firebase to help people in the Rare community manage day-to-day tasks. The application also includes information about the Oklahoma Rare organization, and allows for users to login and view their private tasks.
posts.blogText03: Utilized Bootstrap and Material UI for user-friendly and mobile-optimized designs.
